name: warrior of sunlight
description:
warrior of sunlight

in the loneliness of a small town, strange gateways open in dreams, like phosphenes of meaning by a pulsing sea.

something passes over you, concealed in cloud cover.

this is a web adaptation and partial rewrite of the card game "warrior of sunlight", originally made as a gift for marek kapolka as part of glorious trainwrecks' sekret santa 2019 event. you can find the original here.
